verbs.description: [ARG0: The spokeswoman for first lady Melania Trump] [V: pushed] [ARG2: back] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARG1: on the assertion from President Donald Trump 's outside attorney , Rudy Giuliani , that she " believes her husband " about porn star Stormy Daniels 's allegation of a 2006 affair] .

The spokeswoman for first lady Melania Trump pushed back Thursday on the assertion from President Donald Trump 's outside attorney , Rudy Giuliani , that [ARG0: she] " [V: believes] [ARG1: her husband " about porn star Stormy Daniels 's allegation of a 2006 affair] .
